category: Asset Management (ID.AM): The data, personnel, devices, systems, and facilities that enable the organization to achieve business purposes are identified and managed consistent with their relative importance to organizational objectives and the organization’s risk strategy.

assessment_results: 11 Artifacts reviewed. Component & Information System Inventory(s).  The pictures show the equipment to be recycled and itemized within Configuration Manager and [Vendor/Tool].  The documents show that there is a process to dispose/recycle equipment.  There is a physical order purchase and how it also needs to be entered in the [Vendor/Tool]/ Configuration Manager. There is also an email that documents the [Vendor/Tool] that will dispose/erase of Hard dRives and Tablets.
assessment_reccommendations: The process for equipment removal is shown.  Examples of physical inventory to be added and removed are apparent.  The adding and removal of inventory are shown in the artifacts.  This subcategory is satisfied within the 1 year.
